Html:
In http://blogs.msdn.com/codefx/archive/2009/09/01/work-with-silverlight-deep-zoom.aspx is introduction to DeepZoom example.

When will this example be in All-In-One Code Framework?

Is it possible to see this example and source somwhere, temporary, during waiting to release?
Hi, you can click the "Source Code" tab, and download a recent change set. Any change sets later than 27790 contains the Deep Zoom sample.
